languages.text: Кровь пиратки Риззы, продавшей душу Губительным силам. В ней все еще содержатся частицы ее души — если принести их в жертву на алтаре, Темные боги, несомненно, отблагодарят своего слугу.

The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.
languages.original_text: Кровь пиратки Риззы, продавшей душу Губительным силам. В ней все еще содержатся частицы ее души — если принести их в жертву на алтаре, Темные боги, несомненно, отблагодарят своего слугу.

traits.locale_text: Blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul — should they be delivered as sacrifice to the altar, the dark gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

languages.text: 这些鲜血属于毁灭之力的仆从海盗莱萨，血液中还残留着她灵魂的痕迹。如果能将这些鲜血作为祭品送上祭坛，肯定会得到黑暗诸神的奖赏。
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

traits.locale_text: 这些鲜血属于毁灭之力的仆从，海盗莱萨。血液中还残留着她灵魂的痕迹，如果能将这些血作为祭品送上祭坛，肯定会得到黑暗诸神的奖赏。

languages.text: 〈禍つ神々〉に魂を売った、海賊・ライツァの血。彼女の魂の痕跡を含んでいる。祭壇に生け贄として捧げられれば、暗黒神は間違いなく、褒美を与えるだろう。
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

traits.locale_text: 〈禍つ神々〉に魂を売った、海賊・ライツァの血。彼女の魂の痕跡を含んでいる。祭壇に生け贄として捧げられれば、暗黒神は間違いなく、褒美を与えるだろう。

languages.text: La sangre de la pirata Ryzza, que vendió su alma a los Poderes Ruinosos. Aún contiene trazas de su alma. Si se sacrificaran en el altar, los dioses oscuros recompensarían a su sirviente.
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

traits.locale_text: Sangre de la pirata Ryzza, que vendió su alma a los Poderes Ruinosos. Aún contiene trazas de su alma. Si se sacrificaran en el altar, los dioses oscuros recompensarían a su sirviente.

languages.text: Das Blut der Piratin Ryzza, die ihre Seele an die Mächte der Zerstörung verkauft hat. Es enthält noch immer Spuren ihrer Seele. Sollte das Blut als Opfer am Altar dargeboten werden, würden die dunklen Götter ihre Dienerin zweifellos belohnen.
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

traits.locale_text: Blut der Piratin Ryzza, die ihre Seele an die Mächte der Zerstörung verkauft hat. Es enthält noch immer Spuren ihrer Seele — sollten sie als Opfer am Altar dargeboten werden, würden die dunklen Götter ihre Dienerin zweifellos belohnen.

languages.text: Le sang de la pirate Ryzza, qui contient encore des traces de son âme qu'elle a vendue aux Puissances de la Ruine. À n'en pas douter, les Dieux Sombres récompenseront quiconque leur offrira ce sang en sacrifice sur un autel.
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.

traits.locale_text: Le sang de la pirate Ryzza, qui contient encore des traces de son âme qu'elle a vendue aux Puissances de la Ruine. Les Dieux Sombres récompenseraient très probablement quiconque leur offrirait ce sang en sacrifice sur un autel.

languages.text: Ruhunu Yıkıcı Güçler'e satan korsan Ryzza'nın kanı. İçinde ruhundan izler mevcut. Bu izler sunağa takdim edilirse kara tanrılar, hizmetkârlarını mükafatsız bırakmayacaktır.
languages.original_text: The blood of the pirate Ryzza, who sold her soul to the Ruinous Powers. It still contains traces of her soul. Should they be offered as a sacrifice to the altar, the Dark Gods would undoubtedly reward their servant.
